name: Minecraft Basics: Steve's Birthday Bash!
description:
After you went to the Minecraft basics school you left. But now you have returned since its steve's birthday. Everything seems happy at first, but you will soon find out that something is wrong! Get all the ores and escape before steve and his Minecraft friends get you, or can you? There are also a lot of secret codes!

Most Recent Version: Beta v1.1.3
